Send us a Message

Warning: We get a lot of messages and responses may take longer than you would like. Please try searching on this knowledge base, or try the huge list of communities for more immediate help.

We work from the oldest message first. For this reason, sending multiple messages will further delay response times. Please be patient.

👋 Transactions are Not Showing Up or Pending Forever Adding & Sending Tokens

If this is a question about an existing Swap, you MUST press the orange button at the bottom of the swap page. We cannot help you via this form, Twitter, or Facebook and it will delay the process.

Swap wasn't completed or was canceled Swapping ETH, BTC, REP on MyCrypto via Bity
